description: I am working on diffrent range of products in zeblok like cli based, mlops and other.
Working here comes with everyday learning and its exciting to work at startup.
working here with data scientists , artificial intelligence engineers and devops team gives wide experience about the global market.
I worked on in house platform named merakilearn.org which teaches student around 30k Students per month
Managed Team of 4 - 5 apprentice/Interns , Worked with different volunteers from different nations
Worked on Features Like course content , class and batch feature , Assessment features and Progress Track features
In this internship I worked on tror.ai which was a commercial project
I improved the performance of the website , implemented contact us section ,the Jobs section and Blogs section
